sentences.en: But on at least two issues, such genteel methods are proving inadequate.
sentences.cn: 但至少在两个问题上, 这样的柔性手段显得有些孱弱.

sentences.en: He came from a genteel family.
sentences.cn: 他出身于有教养的家庭.

sentences.en: He was afraid of none, not he ; on'y Silver - Silver was that genteel.'
sentences.cn: 他谁都不怕, 只有希尔弗——希尔弗是那么温文尔雅. ”
她那矫揉造作的腔调使我感到难受。

sentences.en: His ideal of quiet and of genteel retirement was found in Washington Square.
sentences.cn: 他理想中静谧优雅,可以幽居的住处终于在华盛顿广场找到了.

sentences.en: I have known many couples, who have entirely disliked each other, lead very comfortable genteel lives.
sentences.cn: 我认识许多对夫妻, 彼此根本不喜欢, 生活仍然非常舒适温存.

sentences.en: Say a bouquet, sister Jemima ,'tis more genteel.
sentences.cn: 妹妹,用字文雅点儿, 说一束花.

sentences.en: She always talks in a genteel voice when she's on the phone.
sentences.cn: 她打电话时说话总是摆出一副上流架子.

sentences.en: She always talks in such a genteel voice when she's on the phone.
sentences.cn: 她打电话时,说话总是摆出一副上流架子.

sentences.en: She broke into a genteel run.
She is too genteel for words.
She lived a genteel, careful, frugal life.
sentences.cn: 她过著高尚的 、 谨慎而节俭的生活.

sentences.en: Simple and decent, fashionable and meaningful, genteel taste gives out since.
sentences.cn: 简单大方, 时尚又有内涵, 儒雅的绅士味道自然散发出来.

sentences.en: There are not as many genteel young men in Devonshire as Sussex.
sentences.cn: 与苏塞克斯相比,德文郡有教养的年轻人不多.

sentences.en: While dark - haired Bill exudes genteel values, Eric thrills with bad - boy mystique.
sentences.cn: 黑发的比尔散发出一种绅士风范, 艾瑞克则给人一种坏男孩的神秘感.

sentences.en: You are genteel enough, you look like a lady.
sentences.cn: 你是够文雅的, 看上去象个大家闺秀.

words.tran_cn: 有教养的，文雅的；上流社会的

trans.tran_cn: 文雅的，有礼貌的，有教养的，上流社会的
